//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE): "Premonition is special in many ways. Being one of three pulses to roll Demolitionist, and the only high-impact frame to belong to the energy slot. // Heretic (PvE)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE): "Finally a rocket that can compete in today’s meta. There’s a small “exploit” with sunbracers and this rocket with Demo and Cluster bombs, but that’s not exactly everyone’s cup of tea." Recommended MW - Reload.
